as.description: Custom element type for the component

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

locale.description: Define localization settings to display component text in the user's regional language

maxItems.description: Set the maximum number of breadcrumbs to display

onExpand.description: Callback function when the ellipsis is clicked in the collapsed view

size.description: Set the size of breadcrumb items

active.description: Indicates if the breadcrumb item is active

as.description: Custom element type for the component. Defaults to 'a' if 'href' is set

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

href.description: When provided, renders the breadcrumb item as an anchor element

icon.description: Custom icon to display before the breadcrumb item text
